EmailTemplate.name: Override Request Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Eligibility_Rule__c.Program_Name__c} Eligibility Override Request - Approved by Program Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your {!Eligibility_Rule__c.Program_Name__c} Eligibility Override Request for {!Eligibility_Rule__c.Account__c} has been approved by Program Manager. Please click here to review the record.
Thanks, ConEdison
